headline: Union Pacific Shares Vision, Sets Record Straight at Midwest Association of Rail Shippers Winter Meeting
summary: CHICAGO, January 15, 2026--Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) today met with customers at the winter meeting of the Midwest Association of Rail Shippers (MARS) to discuss the benefits of the company’s proposed merger with Norfolk Southern and respond to misinformation from opponents.

content.title: Union Pacific Shares Vision, Sets Record Straight at Midwest Association of Rail Shippers Winter Meeting
content.summary: CHICAGO, January 15, 2026--Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) today met with customers at the winter meeting of the Midwest Association of Rail Shippers (MARS) to discuss the benefits of the company’s proposed merger with Norfolk Southern and respond to misinformation from opponents.

headline: U.S. Labor Secretary Visits Union Pacific Railroad as Part of Nationwide Tour to Promote Job Creation and Workforce Development
summary: OMAHA, Neb., January 15, 2026--Union Pacific Railroad was proud to host U.S. Labor Secretary Lori Chavez-DeRemer on Wednesday at its state-of-the-art Training Center and Harriman Dispatching Center, where she saw firsthand the innovative and world-class training that goes into developing the railroad’s highly skilled workforce, expected to grow with the creation of the nation’s first transcontinental railroad.

content.title: U.S. Labor Secretary Visits Union Pacific Railroad as Part of Nationwide Tour to Promote Job Creation and Workforce Development
content.summary: OMAHA, Neb., January 15, 2026--Union Pacific Railroad was proud to host U.S. Labor Secretary Lori Chavez-DeRemer on Wednesday at its state-of-the-art Training Center and Harriman Dispatching Center, where she saw firsthand the innovative and world-class training that goes into developing the railroad’s highly skilled workforce, expected to grow with the creation of the nation’s first transcontinental railroad.

thumbnail.caption: U.S. Labor Secretary Lori Chavez-DeRemer and Union Pacific CEO Jim Vena stand next to the secured Union Pacific’s newest commemorative locomotive: No. 1616 Abraham Lincoln.
